name: Doodle Man
description:
Developer's  Note:-

We are extremely sorry for the bug that made the game unplayable. 

We have uploaded our google drive link which has the playable version of this game.

Problem:-The winning screen was accidently active.(Current status: Solved. We just unchecked the 'Winning' Screen.) 

Downloadable Link:-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1f8t3zY8Zc_oCRsBGzTaUGHUbGyUc_qWA/view?usp=shari...

Tutorial screenshots is uploaded above in the page. 

We had worked on a variety of level with some more new interesting mechanics(adding the reverse button similar as jump button, thus reversing the direction of the character and many more). And we had some of them working too but due to some bug issues and less time  we couldn't add  them.  If you think this game has potential please let us know. We will be glad to give this game a justice.

Thank You for checking our game  out. It's still a work in progress. Feedbacks will be appreciated.

Credits:-

Game Designer/Sound:-Dennchen Lama.

Level Designer:-Yaksha Malagatti.

Programmer:-Debayudh Rarhi.

Artist:-Monideep Chakraborty.
